name: Idle Burger Empire Tycoon—Game
description:
Do you see yourself as the manager of your own burger restaurant?

Take the step and keep your business afloat while you feed your hungry customers!

Start running a small burger shop and work hard to earn prestige and make your reputation grow. Improve every detail and turn your modest firm into a successful one!

Deal with the needs of your clients and make the proper decisions to expand your business wisely. Expand the kitchen, hire more staff, unlock new recipes and supervise your warehouse.

UNLOCK MULTIPLE SERVICES:

Unlock new spots and equipment in the different departments available and increase the number of clients that you can attend (fryers, shelves, reception counters, etc.). Invest your money and resources and adapt your strategy accordingly to get the best result.

INVEST IN R&D:

As a great manager with a good vision for development, you’ll also need to invest in the future. Do some research to increase your services, furniture, or staff performance. Every department is important, and your management should take all of them into account. The more developed your restaurant is, the higher the income you will generate! Take a look at every option available in the game to make your restaurant the best franchise out there.

KEEP YOUR RESTAURANT UP TO DATE:

Maintain a good reputation by offering new recipes for everyone. Run your restaurant wisely to keep your customers satisfied and make your staff work hard to create the most exquisite burger and impeccable service.

If you like management and idle games, you will enjoy Idle Burger Tycoon! A casual easy-to-play game where strategic decisions have to be taken to manage a hamburger firm with profitable results. Develop your tasty empire starting from a small and modest restaurant into the best cooking firm and sell the best burger in town!

Bon Appétit =)

Main Features:
- Casual and strategic gameplay for every player
- Dozens of objects and ingredients to be unlocked and upgraded
- Lots of characters and interactions
- Funny 3D graphics and great animations
- Management of a successful business
- A small living world in miniature
